nio/ConditionalModifier.description: Adds a new new field, *title*, to input signals. The value of the attribute is determined by the *lookup* parameter. *lookup* is a list of formula/value pairs. In order, the *formula* of *lookup* are evaluated and when an evaluation is *True*, the *value* is assigned to the signal attribute *title*. If multiple formulas match, the first value is the one that is assigned to the signal.

exclude.title: Exclude existing fields?
exclude.description: Whether to exclude existing fields on incoming signals when creating an output signal.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Fields to add onto the incoming signal.

default.description: One signal for every incoming signal, modified according to 'fields' and 'exclude'.
